SMD modelled using parameters specified in `SUEWS_Soil.txt`.
|Recmd|

Observed SM provided in the meteorological forcing file is used.
Data are provided as volumetric soil moisture content.
Metadata must be provided in `SUEWS_Soil.txt`.

Observed SM provided in the meteorological forcing file is used.
Data are provided as gravimetric soil moisture content.
Metadata must be provided in `SUEWS_Soil.txt`.
